description:
A set of items that will aid Class VII in battle.

Flare Butterfly x 1
Fire Talisman x 1
Dragon Incense x 1
Zeram Capsule x 1
U-Material x 20
Sepith Mass x 500

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
name: Trails of Cold Steel IV: Rebellious Septian Set: Fire
